user.title: AquaFlower Login
user.description: Enter your AquaFlower account credentials to connect your smart irrigation devices to Home Assistant.

data_description.username: The email address you use to log into the AquaFlower app
data_description.ha_ip: Your Home Assistant's IP address (for webhook callbacks)

select_devices.title: Select Devices
select_devices.description: Choose which AquaFlower irrigation controllers you want to add to Home Assistant. Each device will be set up with 6 zone controls and daily runtime sensors.

confirm_devices.title: Confirm Devices
confirm_devices.description: Confirm your selected devices and complete the setup. Real-time updates will be enabled via webhook.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please verify your AquaFlower account credentials and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the AquaFlower service. Please check your network connection or server status.
error.cannot_fetch_devices: Unable to retrieve your devices. Please verify your account has registered devices and try again.
error.cannot_register_webhook: Unable to register webhook with AquaFlower service. Real-time updates may not work. Please check your network and try again.

abort.already_configured: This AquaFlower account is already configured in Home Assistant.
abort.no_devices_found: No AquaFlower devices were found for this account. Please register a device in the AquaFlower app first.
abort.no_devices_selected: No devices were selected to configure. Please select at least one device.

init.title: AquaFlower Options
init.description: Adjust settings for your AquaFlower integration. Changes will apply to all configured devices.

set_zone_timer.name: Set Zone Timer
set_zone_timer.description: Set a timer for a specific irrigation zone
